summary.name: ORC - Oxford Road Corridor
summary.description: Students at the Manchester School of Architecture are investigating the logistical network surronding the ORC, Oxford Road Corridor, a specially designated urban area encompassing both the Manchester Metropolitan University, University of Manchester and Manchester Royal Infrimary - all anchor institutions as defined by Muncipical Scholars. We are interested in tracing different porcurement networks within this corridor, seeking to analyse if this is really a local anchor or an area for the extraction of wealth - the results are yet to determine which.

location.address: The University of Manchester, Oxford Rd, Manchester M13 9PL

overview.name: Infinity Incorporated Ltd.
overview.description: Supplier of Merchandise in the University of Manchester Gift Shop
